content.rendered:
Roles & Responsibilities
Designing and building the website front-end.
Creating the website architecture.
Designing and implementing new features and functionality
Designing and managing the website back-end, including database and server integration.
Ensuring high-performance and availability, and managing all technical aspects of the CMS
Helping formulate an effective, responsive design and turning it into a working theme and plugin.

Skills And Qualifications
Extensive WordPress Implementation Experience
Excellent Knowledge of WordPress, MySQL, HTML, CSS, Java Script, Ajax, PHP, XML,BootStrap
Strong understanding of PHP back-end development
Good in WordPress plugin and theme development
Experience of multiple CMS platforms
Good analytical and logical skills, CSS3, JavaScript, HTML5, and jQuery skills are an added advantage
Hook Knowledge
Should be working as an Individual Member
Experience using MySQL database
Knowledge of PHP frameworks a plus
Knowledge of how to interact with Restful APIs and formats (JSON, XML) a plus
Educational Qualifications: B.Tech/B.E., MCA
